Performance tune

5. HOTRG¶

Higher order tensor renormalization group for classical system. [XCQ+12]

Further reading: [ZXC+10]

[XCQ+12]

Z. Y. Xie, J. Chen, M. P. Qin, J. W. Zhu, L. P. Yang, and T. Xiang. Coarse-graining renormalization by higher-order singular value decomposition. Phys. Rev. B, 86:045139, Jul 2012. URL: https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.86.045139, doi:10.1103/PhysRevB.86.045139.

[ZXC+10]

H. H. Zhao, Z. Y. Xie, Q. N. Chen, Z. C. Wei, J. W. Cai, and T. Xiang. Renormalization of tensor-network states. Phys. Rev. B, 81:174411, May 2010. URL: https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.81.174411, doi:10.1103/PhysRevB.81.174411.
